name: Shift City
description:
Arrange and rearrange a shape-shifting town in order to satisfy the whims of the people who visit it!

Controls: left mouse button to pick up and drop tiles. Q/W to rotate a tile. Instructions are in-game.

In case you're getting confused as to what tile is what:

* Red-roof houses = "Villas"

* Brown-roof houses = "Slums"

* Tall tower with blue dome roof = "Tower"

* White castle with four blue roofs = "Palace"

* Greenery (trees, hedges, etc) = "Gardens"
